website_summaries.verdict: RXL SL’s mountain bike handlebars are as durable, sleek, and expertly designed as you’d want them to be, and the wide range of glossy styles means there’s a set for every biker’s tastes.
pros: Available in a wide range of colors and sizes
cons: Your preferred size and color combination may not be in stock

customer_reviews.title: Worst bars ever.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first real MTB use. I had a severe accident with bleeding and gashes all over my body, even with pads & protection, biker following me ran over my bike, bending another $450-$500 worth of components. These pieces of crap suck. Avoid at all costs!!
customer_reviews.author: justink

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I thought maybe the people complaining about them were overtightening them, which is the worst thing to do for carbon components. Not true. Mounted them on my Scott Scale, using fiber grip and a torque wrench. Took them around the block bouncing on them and immediately started popping, which is usually the clearcoat. Not taking a chance at this point, sending back. If you value your teeth, go with the BEIOU's.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S

customer_reviews.title: Keep it to light use only and you'll most likely be fine...
customer_reviews.text: I believe these bars would only be suitable for light trail riding or road. I clipped a small tree on the right side of the bar causing weight to shift to left, pretty common during single track ride. Not a hard enough hit to cause a wipe out unless your carbon bars snap, sending my chest right into the now pointy end of the stick. And yes I did ride it back hence the tape.
customer_reviews.author: jnp

customer_reviews.title: Not well built
customer_reviews.text: This bar leaves a lot to be desired from a build quality perspective. My bars have all sorts of empty black areas which looks to me to be filled with some sort of resin. I have tried flexing the bars with my full body weight a few times and they don't seem to flex too much or make any creaks or cracking sounds, but just based on how poorly all of the weaves line up, I doubt I'm going to be pushing this bar very hard. I will likely swap it out to a bike that will mostly we street usage, and call this one a loss. I don't see it holding up to too much abuse off-road.
customer_reviews.author: K. Klemple

customer_reviews.title: Roll of the dixe
customer_reviews.text: Bought but will probably never use considering the nightmare stories I've read on Chinese carbon bars..and this is one so..I'll get a brand name bar and play it safe because carbon cracks and bones cracking usually follows
customer_reviews.author: Coolman

customer_reviews.title: IT DID NOT RESIST 3 BIKE TRIPS
customer_reviews.text: I had an Easton flat short handlebar and I decided to change it for this carbon fiber product with a low price. After several months of buying this handlebar, I installed it in my Santa Cruz carbon bike, but it only works fine two rides, I felt a wrist pain, then, this weekend I decided to rotate it to adjust it and avoid the injuries, but I found it broken, I have torque wrenches for my bike and I was never adjusted it or damaged it at the installation. It seems to be a low-cost product without quality control. My old carbon handlebar after 4 year is yet working.
customer_reviews.author: JIMmy

customer_reviews.title: Danger Danger Danger Danger
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these I was excited a new pair of bars, carbon. They looked great. First ride with them I went off of a 2 foot drop and they snapped sending me off the bike, all I remember was holding onto a half a bar as I was going to the ground. Thank god I was not hurt seriously. I would not suggest these for anyone and hope no one buys these for your safety spend the money and get a reputable brand. These are dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: stephen c.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Solid and Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this to a stem from same company and super happy with both. Torqued to 5 nm along with fiber paste and after 20 hours or riding nothing has slipped or moved. Did have to saw off about 1.5" from each end, no issues there via a hacksaw and some foamy soap. Ride mainly in NYC so mostly road work with a lot of not so smooth road. Still feels solid and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: I used the bar for several hundred miles of midwest singletrack and 3 trips out west. Lots of rocks, roots, drop offs and a couple of handlebar twisting crashes. No issues at all. I am both pleased and surprised how well this bar has held up. I might have just been lucky, but I have purchased a second one for my fat bike.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on First Ride
customer_reviews.text: Cracked on first ride. Both sides. Haven’t broken yet but don’t want to be on the bike when they do. Gonna swap back to my aluminum bars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive upgrade for kids mountain bikes to loose weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the aluminum bars on my son's 20" Norco MTB. Kids MTBs, even from good manufacturers, are notoriously heavy. I bought this bar to help cut weight at a reasonable price. I'm not to concerned about strength as a kid will not be putting as much weight and abuse on the bars as an adult. With the bar swap and new pedals I cut about 1lb off the stock weight. I'm now back here to buy the same bars for his new 24" Diamondback and this time I'm getting the carbon seatpost as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I carefully installed it, making sure not to over tighten it. I used Park Tool Supergrip to ensure it didn’t slip (decreasing the likelihood of over tightening). I installed it on a hybrid that mostly stays on paved roads (if a little rough). Not sure how it would hold up to true mountain biking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carbon bars, safety issue.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are nice looking and light weight however, my concern had more to do with safety and durability. When riding with them on my 29 er, the bars felt as if they were flexible especially when applying the force normally given while riding. Maybe these would be better on a 26" mtb as the bars are not as long and therefore would be stiffer. Potential safety issue with breaking was my concern
customer_reviews.author: Mark Barry

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly impressed. Didn't expect much
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to try these on my full suspension mountain bike but was nervous about the durability. I recently purchase a mtb for my son and decided to try them out for him (he's 50lbs vs me at 200lbs). After receiving them I mounted a headset on my weight bench and mounted the bars. They held my entire body weight and I was confident enough to put them on my son's bike. Now I'm going to order some for my gravel bike but I'm still a little leary about putting them on my full suspension. Very light and look good. For the money I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bars, Durable?
customer_reviews.text: Nice bars, lightweight and measure perfectly. Make sure you use fiber grip paste and don't overtorque them when installing. Takes a lot of the vibration out of gravel and dirt paths. I don't do extreme biking, so this is great for me! 4 stars because there are a couple of blemishes if you look closely, and the interior diameter is a little bigger than my alloy bars, so the plastic caps won't stay in!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Look good, feel good, ride good.
customer_reviews.text: These bars have worked great for me. Full carbon as advertised and very light. I also love the matte finish, too. Some reviewers have complained about the width but I'm pretty sure the width was stated when I ordered and I got what I was expecting. Also read a reviews about the stem needing to be changed because of these bars but any later model mountain bike uses bars this size at the stem, so no surprises there. I have well over 100 fast paced mile on them and they've been great.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Running these on two of our bikes that see trails and abuse pretty regularly. Both are the riser style. I was a tad nervous but we have put a beating on both and so far so good. Extremely light compared to the alloy bars they replaced. Would recommend to anyone looking to move to a carbon bar!!
customer_reviews.author: JRFlurry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome handle bars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mountain bike! Easy to install, light weight, and looks great! I haven’t jumped or went over rocky terrain yet but so far there perfect. All the parts fit nice on them and the riser clamps down great! I’ll update as soon as I try some jumps on them.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: The bar looks good, no defects. However, when attaching the shifter, brakes, and grips, they all want to slide or move. The center of the bar has something abrasive to prevent the bar from moving on the stem, but the ends of the bar should have it too. I might have to spray something sticky to keep the grips and the items I listed above from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tsa

customer_reviews.title: Identical to Bontrager RXL & Rhythm Pro.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing...Identical to my Bontrager Rhythm Pro Carbon bars & Bonty RXL bars down to every little hash mark and the branding. I’m guessing these cam out of the same factory. Hoping they did. They look to be the same bars but at 1/5 the price. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good handlebars and, for those who are worried about the fragility of carbon fiber, very reliable. Mountain-bikes inevitably take numerous falls and nothing has managed to ruin these bars despite all the abuse they have taken. The 1.25 inch rise is very helpful ergonomically and far easier than extending the headset tube. No sore, numb wrists!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: very light so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have the bars on my mountain bike I haven't really hit them with extreme off-road yet just medium duty so far so good they look good and I read some other reviews and people complained of cracking and popping soon as they put them on and I haven't heard anything yet very light
customer_reviews.author: gary b.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent packaging, AWESOME DESIGN.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is the best. They protected this handlebar with several layer of protecting tape and a some paper which helped to keep the product safe and free of scratches. Nice job packing. Best my favorite part is how it looks with my bike!!! I’m soooo happy with the design.
customer_reviews.author: H. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Not blue enough.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed them. They fee as sturdy and solid as my Easton bars that were much more expensive. I wish there was a little more blue on them though, it’s just a small strip of blue paint.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Best lightweight bars I have used
customer_reviews.text: I love the bars. The feel is amazing and the fit is perfect. These are the lightest bars I have had yet. I highly recommend these if you are considering a light weight setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kohn Sutton Sr

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked on installation at the proper torque. Do not recommend. .
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this bar. Nicely finished and very clean and light. Mounting and alignment marks are easy to see. Ends are nice and clean. A good non slip coating on the center of the bar. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Threw these on my mountainbike and absolutely love them. I ride an older model 90's model full suspension and going from a straight bar to a riser was a huge improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L. Barbor

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, look good, good value. My only complaint is that where the stem goes is smooth, my older handlebars were textured in that area so they don't slip.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: No complaints given the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality; dimensions are accurate; worked fine for a flat-bar conversion on a road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A. Soukup

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and stiff
customer_reviews.text: Weighs just about nothing. Really stiff. Appears to be well made, the markings on the center come in handy during installation and if I ever need to remove and reinstall, will assist in putting it back in the exact same position.
customer_reviews.author: dedjr

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money, definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2017 Trek Superfly 7 about 2 years ago, they are awesome. I ride hard and these have held up for more that 3000 miles so far. Multiple crashes with no cracking or any problems at all. They aren't the lightest bars in the world, but significantly lighter than aluminum ones. I have 2 pairs of these now on different bikes and they are just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Pattern imperfect and not aesthetically consistent
customer_reviews.text: Poor material aesthetically... Several imperfections in the carbon fiber including a large black blob just off center of the bars where it is very visible. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KozKnowz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and the price was fantastic. My aluminum bar was light gray from fading. I replaced my bar, stem, grips and seatpost. My bike looks almost new again.☺️
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the 740mm, it's identical in length to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 740mm, it's identical in length to my 750mm. Weight is light. 174grams!! Appears strong. I was able to stand on it while it was braced between 2 chairs and it didn't flex. I tried leaning on it while braced and no flex. It's a winner. I weight 202lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan259

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and comfortable bar
customer_reviews.text: Ok update three trail rides Single track with roots. No issues. Bar felt great. Even seem more solid then my aluminum bars. Carbon even seemed to take some of the vibration and hits better. My hands did not seem as tired. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: I am doubting the authenticity of the material being real carbon
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any problems yet, but bend a little more than I expected not bad, but I might spend a little more and get the brand name
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: Dimensionally perfect for my headset mount and all attachments! Grips fit tight, no slip!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far, great fit and finish.
customer_reviews.text: Quality LOOKS good, fit and finish excellent.... just hope the strength and longevity prove itself!... but good so far!
customer_reviews.author: CactusJack

customer_reviews.title: Best carbon bar value out there.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. Fits perfectly on a 2020 Trek Rail 9.7. Dampens vibration excellent. OA 5 star ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nimmick

customer_reviews.title: Very light bar
customer_reviews.text: More than what I expected. Very light, nice pattern and good quality for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Joha

customer_reviews.title: This bar feels stiffer and stronger then most steel and ...
customer_reviews.text: This bar feels stiffer and stronger then most steel and any aluminum bars that these hands have steered. The carbon weave looks incredible in gloss finish. The weight of the bars was less then the shipping package!!
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipent

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: These bars look and feel great on my project XR Pro. Super lightweight, so I did shed 2 lbs when replacing my stock bars and stem. Goes great with a Wake Stem.
customer_reviews.author: D504

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are really nice looking on my Cannondale all black FSi carbon. They are crazy stiff and strong, and are ridiculously light, especially when compared to aluminum bars. Sick value. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Hill1

customer_reviews.title: Grip diameter is too small for ODI grips
customer_reviews.text: Grip area diameter is too small. ODI lock ons slide right off even when tightened till the wrench is twisting. Never had a problem with raceface or other “normal” brand carbon bars.
customer_reviews.author: daniel j maslin

customer_reviews.title: Thin carbon
customer_reviews.text: Returned, didnt even install. I didnt want to chance chinese carbon splintering. Bought Alum. Wake ones
customer_reviews.author: karlyn

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked them alot. Light, wide and good bar. After my ride today, which I never ride crazy or do big jumps, I noticed a line going through a decal on the bar. Upon further inspection and some flexing of the bar the line got larger. Yes, it's cracked! So now I've got to change out my bars back to some smaller width aluminum until I get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MMuscott

customer_reviews.title: Great value carbon MTB handlebar
customer_reviews.text: Better shock-absorbing than the stock alloy bar. Lighter too. Nice markings help aligning/installing. Mine is the rise version, is relatively straight, no sweep back. Great value at about $32.
customer_reviews.author: Trone-La

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is a *nice* set of handlebars, entry level carbon fiber for MTB. It's a wider diameter so you'll need a different stem. Make sure to measure and order the width you want and be careful not to overtighten your fittings.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: This is a gorgeous carbon fiber bar for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just don't compromise it by torquing to the stem max which is too much for carbon fiber. Use the bar's specs.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Perry

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a pretty hard-core aggressive rider even though I ride a cross-country bike I was able to put a hairline crack in these bars and had to throw them away for fear of them snapping fully under a heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for XC races
customer_reviews.text: My daughter races these and they have held up well. Only complaint is that the diameter is a bit smaller at the ends so we had to add some tape under the control clamp to keep them from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Larrie Brysch

customer_reviews.title: Nice bars.
customer_reviews.text: They look great! Made sure not to over tighten them. Went on the first ride with them and they were awesome. Never hear a noise from them and they never budged. I’m no pro, so for me they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Nandez11

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These have stood up to my 260lb on everything so far. Good play and very good for vibration dampening. Stem section has an abrasive coating pre installed so no need for carbon paste.
customer_reviews.author: cory grove

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, looks good
customer_reviews.text: bars feel great. seem solid and look very good. No aggressive trail riding yet so can't attest for durability, but so far, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JC74074

customer_reviews.title: 2 ride review
customer_reviews.text: 2 ride review So far these have worked well I ride a Mtn SS and have put 30 Miles on them and are working well lightweight and stiff
customer_reviews.author: cellularvilla

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous!!! I’ve had so many pictures that don’t match the product but not this one. This is flawless! Great job. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather and tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: These handlebars have worked out great so far. They feel incredibly solid and have an ultra smooth finish with no burs or imperfections. These made a great upgrade for my bike in terms of weight reduction, control and style points.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Yusko-LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Let’s see how long will it last...
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today, a bit late but at least it came, it looks nice a$$ hell let’s see how long it will last on me before I eat sh$&!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ralphyboii

customer_reviews.title: Great bars defiantly a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm really liking these bars man been no em for some months now no problems at all with them they honestly don't look strong in person but there great especially with the price I only cut about two inches off on both ends an been good to go since
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Because that handlebar is  very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the design totally my bike looks better 🚴‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Gig Willy

customer_reviews.title: Look great and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Have not been on a trail yet but they look great and true to size. I ordered the 740 riser and they are indeed 740.Bolted on nicely, everything is nice and tight. Very happy !
customer_reviews.author: trailshots

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They made such a big difference for my bike. Super lightweight too. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great for bike polo bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Lines make it easy to cut to your desired length. I took about 4.5 centimeters off each side for my bicycle polo bike and its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Callinectes

customer_reviews.title: just what i expected, carbon bars - packed very ...
customer_reviews.text: just what i expected, carbon bars - packed very well and not a scratch on them when they arrived. cant wait to mount them up and take them out for a scratch or two.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars. Can't tell them apart from the uber expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and solid so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very happy with the quality. No flex and the carbon looks to be evenly layed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best bars ever.
customer_reviews.text: So light, I thought the package was empty. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my bike and I could hear and feel them cracking the entire time I was riding. I used the proper torque settings that the bar suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This handlebar broke on my second ride.... its not worth it...
customer_reviews.author: miguel portillo

customer_reviews.title: Light, stiff, ridiculously low price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very light and stiff, ridiculously low price. Have had it for 6 months and a fair amount of miles, hasn't broken or cracked.
customer_reviews.author: S. Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful carbon fiber
customer_reviews.text: The handlebars have a nice clear coat on the carbon fiber, just a beautiful handlebar. Rides very well also
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant buying this bar because it was so cheap. I installed it very carefully without a torque wrench. Rode with it 5 times then got a 5nm torque wrench and tightened it even more. 5 more rides and no problems for a 170lb rider riding xc.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Petre

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine !
customer_reviews.text: i have like 3 /4 months riding with it and it just work fine
customer_reviews.author: Angerus07

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly light bar
customer_reviews.text: Bar is super light. Has a textured area for clamping down the stem. Everything fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel simenal

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! A must buy ! Handlebars are so light that I thought the box was completely empty . Very strong and they look great on the bike .
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Finish is nice and didn't break on my under 75lb daughters riding ...
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive carbon bars. Finish is nice and didn't break on my under 75lb daughters riding weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality A+
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Wasn't expecting these to be this nice for the money but we'll worth it. I'll put them to the test and get back to you.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Good price for carbon fiber bars. they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 rides
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, get what you pay for. Lasted 5 rides, broke on a drop and impaled me in the leg, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, bars are a bit narrow compared to most current bars.
customer_reviews.author: defuser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bars/ lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bars! Got them for my 11 year old Mtn biker. Great width for kids. Super light/ strong. Look great. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: a parr

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. My 4th ride I went over a 8 inch log. Both sides of the handle bars snapped off upon landing. These are NOT worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Thibault

customer_reviews.title: Low quality fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: The clearcoat finish was scrapped up when i opened the package and flaked off while pulling out of the wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: taylor christensen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money even after trying to break them.
customer_reviews.text: had my doubts as to the strength and durability of these bars. Upon install, I really gave them a solid workout. I bought these for a woman that does mild single track and I wanted to make sure they would take the stress. I am 238 lbs of muscle. I pushed the bars as hard as I could and bottomed out the coil forks and almost broke the bead on the tubeless tires. I was suprised the bars didn't even flex. I figure if I can put my weight and strength into these bars, they will hold up to her riding.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Restoration & Conservation

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow area these things lite. They look great and fit as expected. Will update about durability once I've put them through their paces.
customer_reviews.author: ftroop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: High quality, light weight and the color matched my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Mtn Biker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handlebar cracked while installing it on the stem. I was even using a torque wrench, 5Nm.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great deal 💯
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and it seems a good quality as well 🔥
customer_reviews.author: Aldrin j.

customer_reviews.title: Great bars for the price but very narrow width.
customer_reviews.text: Got this bar because I wanted to test a shorter bar on my rig without cutting down my expensive carbon bars. There is a little mismatch on the decals of the bar but, as far as the manufacturing is concerned, these look to be of the same quality as any brand name carbon bars I've bought over the years. The only drawback is that these bars (the flat bars) are very short - especially considering modern standards of bar widths. Something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: camus

customer_reviews.title: More then what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping alot more durable then expected they look absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Mariades

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lacking quality control. One side diameter is larger then other.
customer_reviews.author: Cpt. Obvious

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!! LOOKS GREAT.BREAKS UNDER HARD USE
customer_reviews.author: KATHY LESSER

customer_reviews.title: awesome lite weight
customer_reviews.text: There, awesome lite weight. Just wish they where a bit wider
customer_reviews.author: eric voss

customer_reviews.title: ... these bars so far and they are working out great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have about 80 miles on these bars so far and they are working out great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: as expected. ude flawlessly during the last 3 months. happy with this handlebar
customer_reviews.author: ran

customer_reviews.title: Great lite weight bars.
customer_reviews.text: They started out great but when the left side broke off..... yep, it hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ! Nice piece, great price. Outstanding quality much better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: T Branco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hey what you pay for , but for the price the outer diameter is at least correct
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: it would be fine.
customer_reviews.text: The hand area circumference is too narrow. You can't clamp any MTB brake levers or shifters onto the bars, they just slide off, because the bar is so thin/narrow. If you are just going to use grips and no other parts, it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: CCCCW

product_meta.title: RXL SL Carbon Bicycle Bar End MTB Bike Ergonomics Design Mountain Bike Handlebar Carbon Bar Ends 22.2mm
